channel.title: Tokyo Tsushin Kogyo
channel.description: Recent content on Tokyo Tsushin Kogyo

item.title: Papa Sierra Four
item.description: Announcement Tokyo Tsushin Kogyo is happy to announce a new device which allow sufferers of condition XODY to obtain a pilot’s licence from the Pilot’s Federation, namely the ‘Papa Sierra Four’ or PS4. Condition XODY Many inhabitants of the galaxy are unable to obtain a pilot’s licence due to a condition called XODY. Not much is known about XODY but it’s debilitating effects on anyone attempting space travel are now well documented.

item.title: Papa Sierra Four Hardware Index
item.description: The purpose of this page is to provide a user tested list of hardware known to work with the Papa Sierra Four. HOTAS are the primary focus but other devices are listed. HOTAS Thrustmaster T.Flight HOTAS 4 Bluetooth Keyboards Rii i8+BT Mini Keyboard - CHAT ONLY

item.title: About
item.description: Heritage The Tokyo Tsushin Kogyo Corporation has a long heritage of brining cutting edge technology to the masses. It’s roots can be traced back to Earth in the Sol system. Recent Work We have been working for many years on a device that we hopes will alleviate condition XODY, allowing sufferers to enjoy space flight without the extreme discomfort and difficulties the condition brings. Affiliations TTK is not affiliated with any other organisation.

item.title: Credits
